body.name: 1440P QHD Built-in GPS Wi-Fi Dash Cam, Front and Inside Car Camera Recorder with Infrared Night Vision, Supercapacitor, 4 IR LEDs, G-Sensor, Parking Mode, Loop Recording (D30S)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 2 hrs 39 mins
features: 【2.5K+1080P Dual Dash Cam Designed for Uber Drivers】Capture sharp details simultaneously with the front (170°) and cabin (150°) cameras at QHD 2.5K(2560*1440P)+1080P FHD resolution. Perfect for Uber/Lyft/Rideshare drivers, driving license preparation, and family trips. Record passenger incidents, enhance driving behavior, and preserve precious memories.

【Superior Night Vision】The dashboard camera combined with F1.8 aperture and WDR technology to significantly improves imaging effect. Furthermore, the cabin camera is equipped with 4 infrared LED light to enhance night vision, even in the darkest nighttime driving conditions, the infrared night vision can sharply capture details.

【Built-in Wi-Fi Connection & Dedicated Free APP】With built-in Wi-Fi, the dash camera for cars can easily connect to the FREE "Ficam" APP. You can conveniently check/download/share videos and do all the settings. In case of accidants, quickly showing the footage to law enforcement can help describe what happened excactly without the need of pulling out the SD card and looking for a laptop.

【Built-in GPS Tracking & Reliable Super Capacitor】The built-in GPS module enables the dash cam front and inside to precisely pinpoint the vehicle’s location and routes on the map, and time is automatically updated by GPS. Satisfactory details improving the reliability of recordings. It also equipped with super capacitor so it can withstand high/low temperatures. With the significant advantages in terms of long-term reliability, the life duration and the high performance are also ensured.

【Adjustable G-sensor & 24h Parking Mode】Adjustable G-sensor helping the Uber camera adapting to various road conditions. Once it detects sudden shaking or collision, it will save the videos as locked files to keep longer. 24 hours parking function makes both front and inside cameras automatically turn on and record when shake/collision is detected, excellent sound recording function will gather more convincing information. (The hardware kit NOT include).

【AUTO Loop Recording & AUTO File Overwrite】The dashcam doing seamlessy loop recording by automatically starts/stops with engine ON/OFF. Eliminating manually set 'start recording' before each driving. As dividing of the recording into minutes lengths, you can find your decisive moments efficiently. By auto file overwriting, getting rid of worrying missing any shot in an emergency due to lack of capacity.

【LIFETIME WARRANTY & 7*24 CUSTOMER CARE】The compact design of D30S also makes installation easily even novice users. COOAU provide a lifetime warranty for this dash camera. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us to get 7*24 high-quality after-sales service and technical support. If there's any doubts, we support replacement or full refund within 30 days.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: COOAU solves car safety for 8+ years, helped 350k drivers in US, Canada, UK. Developed driving recorders tailored to local needs. D30s dual dash cam excels with high-quality front and inside video. Best choice with Wi-Fi, compact design hidden behind rear-view mirror for distraction-free driving.

Dual 1440P+1080P recording does not lie Dual dash cam records front and inside at 2.5K + 1080P @30fps. High video resolution captures clear images, making license plates and street signs visible day and night. Infrared Super Night Vision Advanced NOVATEK CPU sensor, F1.8 6-glass lens and dual F1.8 aperture cabin facing cam greatly enhance night vision inside and outside your vehicle in low light environment, making you driving safer at night. Also the cabin camera has an adjustable position.

Previous page 170° + 150° Viewing Angle Record More Critical Details on Each Side Enough to see the whole road, confirming a safe driving experience for you and your family. Easy Operation Share Video and Photo Files Directly Yes, everything can be done from the phone, no need to remove SD cards frequently. GPS Module Built-in Records Accurate Speed and Location Data Help dispute speeding violations, as well as offer more information in the case of an accident Endless Loop Recording Never Miss Out on a Critical Recording Important video will be locked in case of a collision, giving the driver extra peace of mind Next page 1 WIDE VIEWING ANGLE 2 SMART APP CONTROL 3 GPS TRACKING 4 LOOP RECORDING& G-SENSOR

Previous page Dual Parking Monitoring Motion-Trigger & G Sensor Trigger Parking Mode Round-the-clock protection and surveillance for your vehicle （Hardwire Kit Needed） Revolutionizing Road Safety If you want all-around protection & durability, capacitor-powered D30S will be the better choice. Capture More Details Ensure Clear Recordings in Bright and Dark Light Provides the best image whether it's in direct sunlight or under the low street lights at night Next page 1 24HR PARKING MODE 2 IDEAL for ANY CLIMATE 3 WIDE DYNAMIC RANGE

256GB Large Storage Capacity Supports up to 256GB, 10 class or above.Save you're hassle of frequently formatting SD card and give you long duration of video recordings. Easy installation Two mount options (suction cup/adhesive mount) allows for flexibility of where you install the camera in your car, both can swivels and is adjustable Audio Recording(ON/OFF) Built-in microphones can capture conversations, sounds of other vehicles, even sirens in the distance. Which can provide valuable context to the video What's in the box? 1 x COOAU dashcam (model: D30S) 1 x Micro USB Cable(11.81ft) 1 x Car Cigar Lighter Charger 1 x Suction Cup Mount ,1 x Adhesive Bracket 1 x User Manual

Capture Every Moment for Added Peace of Mind! Have a kid who is a newly licensed driver? Have a business reason to limit liability through documentation? Never want to rely on a "he said/she said"? Get the D30S. A lot of features, but more cost-effective than more expensive models. It does everything you would need in a dash cam!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great so far...
reviews.reviewText: I just received the COOAU Dashcam D30S and so far it's performed exactly as stated...I installed it on my 2021 GMC Sierra, just to the left and slightly behind the rear view mirror, using using the GM taped mounting bracket. The suction cup mounting bracket seems to work well, however I wanted to use the lower profile one.I plugged the dash cam into the USB port instead of the 12v adapter port (GMC Sierra's 12v adapter port is always on unless you move a 50 amp fuse). Upon turning it on I found the menu was easy to navigate and quickly set the dash cam up.I installed the Ficam app on my phone and was able to quickly connect to the dash cam's Wi-Fi. I did notice that if you want to use the app outside the vehicle you will have to disconnect the dash cam and reconnect it to a micro USB (close to your phone) whenever you want to use the app. I can understand this as the dash cam has to be on when downloading video to the app.GPS seems to work okay, however I have noticed that when sitting still, especially inside a garage, the display sometimes shows that the vehicle is moving approximately 1 mph.So far the video looks very good on the small viewing screen and through the app. I've only had it installed for a day and have not used it a lot, so time will tell.The bright blue power and blinking red recording light are a little bit annoying when it is dark, however a small piece of electricians tape can take care of that. There's still a red dot on the screen that blinks when they dash cam is recording.I did not want to hardwire the dash cam to my vehicle at this time, as you need to purchase the wiring separately, so I guess it will not be using the parking mode (maybe at a later date).Pros:... Small profile... Easy to install with various options... Accepts up to 256 GB micro SD... Both cameras have good video... Can record front of vehicle, inside vehicle or both... View screen can show front of vehicle, inside vehicle, PIIP front of vehicle main or PIIP inside vehicle main... View screen can be set to turn off or go into screensaver mode... Navigation through the settings is very easyCons:... Blue power light and red blinking recording light are bright and annoying... Wiring harness to hardwire and be able to use parking mode has to be purchased separately... No internal battery, which would be nice to keep from having to hardwire dash cam to vehicle

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact dual-camera and very easy to operate.
reviews.reviewText: This was a nice camera at an excellent price. I wanted both front and rear facing cameras but didn't want to run a second camera to the back. This has front and rear cameras on the same unit so it records in front of the camera through the windshield and out the back. I have a pickup truck so that setup works perfectly. I also got a little power cable that uses the power supply on the back of my rear view mirror for power so I didn't have to run any wires to the fuse box or anything! That came from Dongar Technologies. They have them for several vehicles so if you get this dashcam (or any dashcam), check that out to see if one of those cables is compatible because it makes the installation tons easier. For me, I think it took only five minutes to install.The app is easy to use, as well. We have cameras in our other vehicles that are okay but the software/app can be clunky. This app is better than the others we have. I definitely recommend this camera as it's outstanding for any sub-$200 dual camera I could find. The quality is great and it's easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great Dashcam for the price with full features.
reviews.reviewText: I have only had a few months of experience, but I already like this Dashcam. The sound & video quality are excellent, and the GPS feature is especially great. The design looks good too.I did get a bit confused with the wifi features, but considering the good price for this Dashcam. I don't need anything more.Generally, This is a great Dashcam for the price with full features I need.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great price for well built unit. Does not have a cheap feel. Mounts and connects with phone with ease. Night vision works good but could be better

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and discreet!
reviews.reviewText: It's small and looks very well built. Image quality is very good on both front and cabin camera. Cabin camera night time recording is great. I bought it because I do ridesharing and this product is perfect, good quality and price. Easy installation and setup through the app. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very fine dash camera
reviews.reviewText: I like almost everything about the camera. It functions fine and does what is expected of it.Only one minor complaint. It takes a long time to download a 3 min movie to the connected smart phone via the Wi-Fi connection to the camera.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Poorly Designed Dashcam, Bad App and Missing Included SD Card
reviews.reviewText: This dashcam fails for at least 4 major reasons:1.the online description states in red highlight a "64 GB SD Card included" - but the box contained no SD card, worse yet there is no warning until you go to the online user manual that normal SD cards will not work - the manual online provides the specs for a more expensive SD card than the normal SanDisk Ultra class 10 that my other dash cams use and that I have handy2.the power cord plug that goes into the cigarette lighter outlet does not have a usb port to also charge your phone in the car - the dash cam hogs the whole thing, unlike other manufacturers that design that as standard3.the settings menu is impossible to get to once you put an SD card in - the unit starts recording and does not allow you into settings, so you have to take out the SD card and set up the unit like the first time if you ever want to change a setting4the Ficam app to use the wifi features is rated "3.2" on the PlayStore and the most recent reviews say it is full of glitches and causes many problems on phones it is used on - so definitely do not use - which makes this dashcam mostly useless.Strongly do no not this manufacturer or the COOAU Dash Cam D30.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great camera, simple to set up
reviews.reviewText: Fantastic picture quality and can accommodate a 256gb SD card. Love this camera.

Totalmente contento con la cámara!, al vincularla con la aplicación, prácticamente te lleva de la mano, todo lo hace ella, perfectamente diseñada, se manipulan de manera muy cómoda los videos, la calidad de video hacia el exterior e interior del carro es excelente, abarca un tremendo rango al exterior, y lo suficiente al interior.Llego rápido, es el modelo que se indica "Dash cam D30 COOAU", tuve mis dudas en que me llegara una distinta, ya que ni en la propia pagina de la marca de la cámara esta disponible, por esa razón lo dude.La recomiendo a un cien por ciento, la he usado poco, han sido apenas 25 días, pero ha funcionado a la perfección, al encender el carro empieza a funcionar, y al apagarlo, pasa como un minuto y se apaga, tiene diferentes funciones que también fácilmente se pueden manipular.Super contento con esta compra, hubiese deseado que la cámara fuera ligeramente mas pequeña, pero no es algo que afecte, cuando la gente ve el carro, lo primero que hace es ver la cámara ya que es muy notoria, al estacionarlo en alguna plaza comercial, tiendo a quitarla, cosa que no es cómodo, ya que los robos están al por mayor y quiero evitar rompan un vidrio y me roben mi cámara que tan feliz me tiene y sobre todo por que su costo no es bajo.El audio que graba, si es de baja calidad, y el audio es parte importante en alguna situación en la cual se podría llegar a necesitar como prueba, pero lo que se escucha, pues es aceptable de alguna manera.No duden en pedirla, es mas que necesaria en los tiempos que vivimos, ya que un video o incluso un audio, podría evitarnos muchos problemas, para demostrar lo contrario. Saludos y si mas adelante llego a detectar algún detalle, se los hare saber.
Good quality product and rapid delivery.
Me gusta porque puedo grabar recorrido y los que van en el carro, útil para consultar situaciones que pasan durante el camino..
A los 7 meses dejo de funcionar, no la recomiendo me intento comunicar con el proveedor y no responden, no gasten su dinero no funciona
